title: Confessions of a Headhunter
creator_credit: Sally Riley, Archie Weller and Scarlett Pictures
brief_description: In the film, two Noongar men – Frank and Vinnie – travel across the country and seek revenge for the repeated beheading of the statue of their ancestor warrior Yagan.

constellations_other.name: Laughing in the face of adversity
constellations_other.description: Comedy has been used by First Nations storytellers as a tool for social change. On our screens, humour invites audiences to engage with stories and prompts them to grapple with ideas that they otherwise might shy away from.

creator_credit_for_label: Sally Riley, Archie Weller and Scarlett Pictures
